name: Drop Throw Dungeon
description:
After countless failures ,my first project is finished.  

in the dungeon, player need throw items at the enemy, and find other items to throw at the same time

I hope you like it.  :D

WASD to move

space to pick up item

mouse left to throw item

click inventory to drop item

drag out inventory to drop item to mouse point

Esc pause game

PS: 

i have bad english , english not my first language

most sentence is with the help of google

if my grammar is wrong, plase correct me :D
